ServerThread - Class in it.unipr.desantisinvitto
The ServerThread class defines the behavior of the threads created by the server to manage the communication with each client.

setStop(boolean) - Method in class it.unipr.desantisinvitto.PriceGeneratorThread
This method is called by the last server thread in order to tell the generator to stop its execution.
